Subskills.name: Tire Density
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by tire fire.

Subskills.name: Increased Stock
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of tire fire.

Subskills.name: Monster Truck Tire
Subskills.description: Now sends out a big monster truck tire stunning and knocking monsters up on hit dealing increased damage. Tire fire now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Hard Hitter
Subskills.description: Knocks monsters back with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bouncy Tire
Subskills.description: Tires now bounce over gaps and short terrain dealing a damaging area of effect pulse when landing.

Subskills.name: Overheated
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Loose Tire
Subskills.description: Send out a bouncing tire dealing increased area of effect damage every time it lands.

Subskills.name: The Machinist
Subskills.description: Increases faster cast rate when casting tire fire.

Subskills.name: Oily Tire
Subskills.description: Tire now leaves a trail of oil behind with increased radius.

Subskills.name: Impact Angle
Subskills.description: Tires now bounce off of high terrain and environment increasing its damage per impact.

Subskills.name: Mini Tires
Subskills.description: Now send out multiple smaller tires in an arc.

Subskills.name: Donuts
Subskills.description: Tires now spiral outwards inflicting fire break on hit.
